EmailTemplate.name: 03_12_2014 March News Mailer.turboticker-S_march
EmailTemplate.subject: turboticker for IT Pros | Win A LEGO Star Destroyer | March 2014
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.First Name:default=March 2014}}: We're rewriting the virtualization history books, one VM at a time. We want {{company.Company Name:default=you}} to be a part of the rewrite. turboticker is our way of planning the footnotes. Another Success Video <http://bit.ly/MUQcEA>
Hatco Corporation, a leader in foodservice innovation, is the latest installment in VMTurbo's Customer Success Series. Check out the video <http://bit.ly/MUQcEA> featuring Hatco Systems Administrator Aaron Bolthouse, and learn how Hatco defeated VM sprawl. The Hyper-V Readiness Series <http://bit.ly/1eaIu0G>
Join Scott Lowe and David Davis of Virtualization Software <http://bit.ly/1eaIu0G> as they unpack the Hyper-V ecosystem, why it's ready for prime time, and how to safely diversify your hypervisor mix.
All registrants will be automatically entered to win a LEGO Star Wars Star Destroyer set, valued at $399.
Our Smartest Blog Posts Safely Add Hyper-V Diversity to your IT Environment <http://bit.ly/1g6IPFI> Webinar: VirtualizationSoftware.com’s Hyper-V Readiness Series, Episode 1 <http://bit.ly/1eaIu0G> Goldilocks & Supply Chains with VMTurbo – Review by Aaron Delp <http://bit.ly/1chED6E> VMTurbo Selected as a CRN Data Center Top Virtualization Product <http://bit.ly/1hUOBuL>
Data Center Haiku Server room drama. VMs ballooning again. Try VMTurbo <http://bit.ly/1hUOI9o>.
